newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Surgical in deal with Health Services.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Surgical in deal with Health Services.

text.p: United States Surgical Corp said Friday it signed a new five-year prime vendor agreement with Health Services Corp of America covering all stapling, laparoscopic and suture products.
Effective June 1, the new agreement covers more than 960 hospitals served by Health Services Corp and is expected to generate nearly $300 million in sales over the next five years.
Health Services Corp is a Missouri-based health care group purchasing organization.
